item.description:
Dear Salem MA Meditation Group
I'm sending you this invitation in case you are interested in this very special event that will possibly fill up. Because of your interst in meditation and raising your vibration and passing on light and love to others, you may want to attend this very special event. After the training there will be events held at A Higher Balance to pass on the Oneness Blessing to others. Thank you,
Judy

Oneness Awakening Course
Become a Blessing Giver
Saturday and Sunday, June 26 & 27 9:00-6:30
Facilitated by Oneness Trainer Patricia Conte-Nelson www.BlessedInOneness.com , you will heal relationships, deepen your experience of divine grace, experience Oneness Blessings and receive an initiation to be a giver of The Oneness Blessing to others. Register by contacting Michelle Magee 603-986-6142 or rosequartz1717@yahoo.com . Fee is $195, due by June 12. Please register early; space is limited. . Note from Judy: This training was formerly only given in India. We welcome this opportunity to host this weekend to undergo our own next level of healing and receive the initiation that will allow us to spread this blessing to other people. The blessing (also known as Deeksha) is given to others through a transmission of light and energy from your hands to the crown of someone’s head. It’s a beautiful thing, and is meant to help our evolution and awakening. See more about the Oneness Movement at www.Onenessuniversity.org
You may RSVP on Meetup but please register directly with Michele, as indicated above.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Oneness Awakening Course
